title: Python (programming language)
summary: Pythonis ahigh-level,general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizescode readabilitywith the use ofsignificant indentation.[34]Python isdynamically type-checkedandgarbage-collected. It supports multipleprogramming paradigms, includingstructured(particularlyprocedural),object-orientedandfunctional programming.
